node.full_text:
Last week I started to share some tips on #microfrontends and I thought would be easier for everyone if I gather them on a website!
I'd like to introduce you to https://t.co/rAY2FgyJmu
You can find all the tips shared with #buildingMFE in one place

#frontend #web #javascript #js https://t.co/FlFREoN3ZJ

Have you ever thoughts about the #microfrontends principles?
- Modelled Around Business Domains
- Culture of Automation
- Hide Implementation Details
- Decentralization over Centralization
- Deploy Independently
- Isolate Failure
#buildingMFE #frontend #javascript @OReillyMedia https://t.co/CtbO3DMVok

Do you know what a #microfrontend is?
A micro-frontend represents a business domain that is autonomous, it can be delivered independently and it's owned by a single team
#buildingMFE #web #frontend #javascript #software #js #microfrontends #learning @OReillyMedia @jpollock149 https://t.co/bo9HQFgCDd
